name: Le Thanh Tong
address: 16 Le Thanh Tong, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
If what you're looking for is a conveniently located hotel in Hanoi, look no further than Le Thanh Tong. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

Take advantage of a wealth of unrivaled services and amenities at this Hanoi hotel. This hotel offers numerous on-site facilities to satisfy even the most discerning guest.

All guest accommodations feature thoughtful amenities to ensure an unparalleled sense of comfort. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Superb facilities and an excellent location make the Le Thanh Tong the perfect base from which to enjoy your stay in Hanoi.
